title: [Extension Proposal] KafkaStreams processor

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Quarkus extension enriching Kafka Streams topologies through decorators:
* CONTINUE error strategy and dead letter queue
* Resiliency against Punctuator errors
* Retry mechanism with Smallrye Fault Tolerance

### Repository name

quarkus-kafka-streams-processor

### Short description

Extension to easily build resilient Kafka Streams topologies based on the Processor API

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-kafka-streams-processor/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- kafka-streams
- resiliency

### Additional context

The extension relies on quarkus-kafka-streams core extension for bootstraping the KafkaStreams topology.
It only has a loose coupling with Quarkus, and could be split into a standalone library usable with another bootstrap and a Quarkus extension in the future. For now, it is only used and tested within a Quarkus project, hence the single-repository extension approach.
